name: DocPlugin
author: Edgar Arroyo
desc: This plugin is summoned when you type -w next to a programming language command, DocPlugin helps you while programming returning info about certain features of a programming lang .
features: 'py3 -w for' retuns info about the for in python3
'py3 -w if' retuns info about the if statement in python3
'py3 -w range' retuns info about the range feature in python3
